channel.title: Ipbanning and banning in general
channel.description:
Did not work on [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/2a95w6s.png[/img] not sure whats going on. I got more screens of the stuff they were doing i'll post later.
Anyway cant ban offline players either.

item.title: Ipbanning and banning in general
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Moparisthebest:

So does banning players in-game work when they aren’t logged in? I ‘fixed’ it and no one told me it didn’t work.

No. At least, it hasn’t for me.

Read full topic

item.title: Ipbanning and banning in general
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

So does banning players in-game work when they aren’t logged in? I ‘fixed’ it and no one told me it didn’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: Ipbanning and banning in general
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:13, topic:409666”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=510942.msg3711257#msg3711257 date=1313363644]
Your residence was gone Tom, you need to come back and re-establish it. Also, do you care if I remove the wall between us? I’m not worried about potential mob problems.
[/quote]

Go ahead, I also couldn’t reestablish it because Evil_ was the one who protected it and he was mining in the mines irl.

Can you show me that boat route to spawn as well, please? I’m not getting all my crap back by mining so I’m going to slaughter the residence of spawn instead.[/quote]

I’ll try to get on tomorrow to show you the route. Basically you head directly towards spawn.

Read full topic

item.title: Ipbanning and banning in general
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Moparisthebest:

Your residence was gone Tom, you need to come back and re-establish it. Also, do you care if I remove the wall between us? I’m not worried about potential mob problems.

Go ahead, I also couldn’t reestablish it because Evil_ was the one who protected it and he was mining in the mines irl.

Can you show me that boat route to spawn as well, please? I’m not getting all my crap back by mining so I’m going to slaughter the residence of spawn instead.

Read full topic

item.description:

Your residence was gone Tom, you need to come back and re-establish it. Also, do you care if I remove the wall between us? I’m not worried about potential mob problems.

item.title: Ipbanning and banning in general
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Dammit! I’ve lost all my items again.

Oh also, no ones been on my forum account and nobody else has reported such happenings so maybe you had an easy to guess password? Even if someone got my password, it would take them a few hours to type it!

Read full topic

item.title: Ipbanning and banning in general
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Someone had to have gotten your password somehow, otherwise none of that could have happened. Was it easy to guess maybe?

You are welcome to the stuff in my chests downstairs, also I did some work on the roof of the library, but I don’t know how you want to finish the ends off, so I left that alone.

Read full topic

item.title: Ipbanning and banning in general
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:8, topic:409666”]I doubt you were keylogged, I’m thinking it has to be some type of minecraft client thing.

When xAuth was disabled, you didn’t happen to type ‘login yourforumpass’ without the ‘/’ in front did you? That would have done it.[/quote]I don’t think I did after I typed /login and noticed nothing happen I just stopped using login all together.

Edit Also you didn’t rollback far enough half of my chest inside your castle are still gone and it says that I did it…

EDIT: I rolled myself back and the chest are back but there’s nothing inside them obviously. This is what I get for being the only mod on to deal with hackers at 6am in the morning I suppose.

Read full topic

item.title: Ipbanning and banning in general
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I doubt you were keylogged, I’m thinking it has to be some type of minecraft client thing.

When xAuth was disabled, you didn’t happen to type ‘login yourforumpass’ without the ‘/’ in front did you? That would have done it.

Read full topic

item.title: Ipbanning and banning in general
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:6, topic:409666”]You always run ubuntu? Chances are you don’t have a virus then. Have you used any clients or client mods recently? Do you use the same password here as anywhere else?[/quote]The password I use here is different from other passwords such as email and such. And no I don’t run client mods. And if I were going to I’d decompile them and check the source code first.

And yeah I always run ubuntu. Don’t even have windows installed.

As far as I can tell all my other accounts are as of now unaffected.

EDIT: My rs account is fine also which I logged into today to see how much money I had to give to Tom. It’s a fairly decent character and if I were keylogged I image it would have been stolen.

Read full topic

item.title: Ipbanning and banning in general
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

You always run ubuntu? Chances are you don’t have a virus then. Have you used any clients or client mods recently? Do you use the same password here as anywhere else?

Read full topic

item.title: Ipbanning and banning in general
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:4, topic:409666”]It couldn’t have anything to do with xauth, it has no access to passwords at all. You need to change your email password too, because they can recover it that way. Run some virus scans as well.[/quote]I’m running ubuntu what virus scanner would you suggest?

EDIT: I also deleted those 3 post that someone made.

EDIT EDIT: Also this is pretty much a fresh installation.

I know axuth doesn’t have access to password in that sense but someone was able to log in under your name with full access to the server is it not possible for them to read logs or such in-game and get my password?

Read full topic

item.title: Ipbanning and banning in general
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

It couldn’t have anything to do with xauth, it has no access to passwords at all. You need to change your email password too, because they can recover it that way. Run some virus scans as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Ipbanning and banning in general
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

Moparisthebest someone somehow got access full access to my account and posted stuff on the forums.

http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,511140.msg3709577.html#msg3709577
http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,511140.msg3709569.html#msg3709569
http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,511140.msg3709560.html#msg3709560

Does this have anything todo with the xauth being disabled on the server?

EDIT: I’ve changed my password also my ip is 74.243.210.152 and under whois should show up as Gaston, SC 29053 anything other than that is not me. Is it possible for you to find out who’s behind this?

Read full topic

item.title: Ipbanning and banning in general
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I love nothing better than un-documented feature-breaking changes:
http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/gen-sec-econ-tp-admn-essentials-v2-5-a-collection-of-useful-commands-and-features-1000.15312/page-53#post-542285

Anyway, banning should be back to the way it was before I guess… Let me know.

Read full topic
